page.title: 05 WEEKLY SHOPPING BASKET
page.content: Chosen for an average family of four. SUPERMARKET 3 packets of biscuits 99p 2 tins of beans 44p 1 tin of corned beef 95p 2 tins of spaghetti 44p 2 tins of soup 44p 1 bag of frozen peas 39p 1 packet frozen fish fingers 69p 1 packet frozen beefburgers 62p 1 packet frozen sausages Â£1.00 cheese 70p 6 yoghurts Â£1.02 butter 48p 1 block of ice-cream Â£1.13 1 box of cornflakes 68p 1 box of cocoa pops 72p sugar 47p 1 bottle of tomato sauce 52p 1 packet of cream crackers 20p 2 bottles of pop 45p 1 bottle of orange juice 99p
